channel.title: Eating doesn't fully heal me
channel.description:
Title says it all. Here's some things to know:
Max level is 200 by the way.
When I eat it only heals me to 120, no higher.
Can anybody help?

item.title: Eating doesn't fully heal me
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

Can you explain a little more? Been a little while since I’ve coded…

Also, sometimes it will go higher than 120 now, sometimes it goes to 135. Here is my current code for the mantas:

} else if ((buryItem - 1) == 391) { if (myHP <= 200) { heal = 50; hitDiff = -heal; myHP += heal; updateRequired = true; hitUpdateRequired = true; sendMessage("You eat the manta ray, it heals 50 hitpoints."); setAnimation(829); } else if (myHP >= 200) { return true; }

EDIT: After diagnosing the problem, I have figured out that the code above does not work at all, and that the only reason it goes above 99 when you eat but after that it doesn’t go up is because the cut off point is 99 but it doesn’t get cut off there. Do you guys know where I can find out how to find more info on the food? (As in, how to change the max level to 200)

Read full topic

item.title: Eating doesn't fully heal me

item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Check the packet that handles using items (packet 122).

item.title: Eating doesn't fully heal me
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

Ok… since you didn’t post your source version or base im going to assume your using a delta based server.
go to potions.java and search the id of the food that isn’t fully healing you. then there should be something like currenthealth = +120 or something like that
change the value, compile and done.
simple <.<

Read full topic
